content: AZCentral.com: Dec. 27th, 2019: “Megafarms and deeper wells are draining the water beneath rural Arizona - quietly, irreversibly.” Ian James and Rob O’Dell, Arizona Republic…”Some areas of the state have dropped so much that the water likely won’t naturally recover in our lifetimes…The average well in the Gila Bend basin has dropped by 62 feet”__no.0445, 2020. #groundwater #waterlevels #aquifers #Southwest
